syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Economics

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Effectiveness of policy options to meet all macroeconomic objectives

learning_objectives.description: effectiveness of different policies in relation to different macroeconomic objectives: fiscal policy including Laffer curve analysis, monetary policy, supply-side policy including market-based and interventionist policies, exchange rate policy, international trade policy
problems and conflicts arising from the outcome of these policies
existence of government failure in macroeconomic policies
